## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Glyma.11G117400](https://legacy.soybase.org/sbt/search/search_results.php?category=FeatureName&version=Wm82.a4.v1&search_term=Glyma.11G117400)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GmGRP7</u>
- **Gene Name:** putative glycine-rich RNA binding protein
- **Genome:** [Wm82.a4.v1](https://legacy.soybase.org/GlycineBlastPages/blast_descriptions.php)
- **Species:** *Glycine max*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - As a direct activator of GmSPCH and **GmGRP7**, which are potentially associated with asymmetric division of young epidermal cells and stomatal opening.
   - The degree of change in GmDREB1D, GmSPCH, and **GmGRP7** expression in response to the stress.
   - Modifying the Dt2-binding sites in the promoter regions of GmSPCH and **GmGRP7** would reduce the expression levels of these two genes.

## Function-related keywords:
   - [stress](/tags/stress/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[stomatal](/tags/stomatal/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[stress-response](/tags/stress-response/)
